data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Stockholm unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Stockholm, Sweden
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Stockholm, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 122,211 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Stockholm.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Stockholm, Sweden to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Tajik people might believe through him.

Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Stockholm, Sweden to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Stockholm, Sweden to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Father, we ask for 425 new simple churches in the state of Stockholm, Sweden. Place a simple church in every community of the 2,127,000 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

location.name: Stockholm
location.people_groups_list: Kurd, Kurmanji, Arab, Sudanese, Arab, Iraqi, Somali, Bosniak
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Kurd, Kurmanji (11,000), Arab, Sudanese (2,200), Arab, Iraqi (93,000), Somali (46,000), Bosniak (32,000)
